title: Display Code Change Plan in Chat
description: Implement a feature to display code change plans generated by the 'Code Plan' agent in the chat interface.
acceptance_criteria: The chat interface displays the code change plan generated by the 'Code Plan' agent in a user-friendly format.
The plan display includes the title, description, and a list of code files, each with its corresponding recommendations.
The plan display visually distinguishes each code file in the plan using clear indicators (e.g., different background colors, icons, or formatting).
The component includes a mechanism for copying the recommendations for each file to the clipboard.
The user can send another message to the 'Code Plan' agent to request specific changes to the plan for a particular file (e.g., 'Can you give me more detailed recommendations for 'index.js'?'.

recommendations: Create a new component to display the plan output from the 'Code Plan' agent, similar to the existing PlanDisplay component.
The component should display the title, description, and code file names, recommendations in a user-friendly way, similar to the existing PlanDisplay component.
Implement a way to visually distinguish each file in the plan (e.g., different background colors, icons, or formatting).
Include a mechanism for copying the command or code changes to the clipboard, similar to the existing PlanDisplay component.
Consider adding a feature to allow users to send another message in the chat asking for changes in the plan. Basically user can ask for changes specific file's recommendations.
Make sure the component is reusable and can be easily integrated into the CodeBlock component.
Update the CodeChat component to handle the new plan output component.
If a JSON object representing a code change plan is detected, render the new plan output component instead of the default code block rendering.
